title: Executive Order 11780-Amending Executive Order No. 11768, Placing Certain Positions in Levels IV and V of the Executive Schedule
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by section 5317 of title 5 of the United States Code, as amended, section 2 of Executive Order No. 11768, of February 20, 1974, placing certain positions in level V of the Executive Schedule, is amended by adding at the end thereof "(10) Principal Deputy Assistant Secretary (International Security Affairs), Department of Defense."
citation: Richard Nixon, Executive Order 11780-Amending Executive Order No. 11768, Placing Certain Positions in Levels IV and V of the Executive Schedule Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/307145
